about_the_game:
ABOUT CARRY ON

Carry On explores how our choices around acquiring, keeping, sorting, and passing on our personal belongings have meaning. Set against the backdrop of a family that has just arrived in a cozy little village, Carry On highlights the experiences of newcomers who arrive in an unfamiliar place for the first time.

FEATURES

  • Adorably cute Zodiac animals to roleplay as.

  • Chill inventory management vibes.

  • Unveil more your personality through Chinese astrology.

  • Acquire objects of meaning that reflect elevation, pride, insight, and connection.

  • Customize your very own luggage and bags with stickers and accessories.

  • Experience a wholesome story with meaningful choices about a close-knit family.

name: Carry On

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Carry On is a cozy, narrative-driven, inventory management puzzle game that explores how our belongings acquire meaning. Roleplay as an adorable Chinese Zodiac animal. Explore themes of family, empathy, and kindness through a story that spans the seasons of life.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
